r.d: Package containes locale validation for NZ such as: * IRD numbers * Regional codes * Telephone number * Postal code * Bank AC * Vehicle License Plates
r.n: QA release Bug #11870 PHPCS Bug #11877 Section missing in phpt also there are tests that simply can't work as intended Bug #11879 IRD numbers must be mod 11 checked - else invalid IRD values are marked valid.
